definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (poet., mostly WsdLt) turn aside, depart (NH Niph., Hiph.; Ar. la0d-a  have recourse to, take refuge in);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[מֵעֵינֶ֑י ְאַל־יׇלֻזוּ]] Pr 3:21 let them not (i.e. sound wisdom, etc., si vera 1., cf. VB) depart from thine eyes (v. Hiph.).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נָלוֹז]] Pr 3:32, Is 30:12; cstr. [[נְלוֹז]] Pr 14:2; pl. [[נְלוֹזִים]] Pr 2:15; —fig., devious, crooked, [[בְּמַעְגְּלֽתָם]] ´[[נ]] Pr 2:15 (‖[[עִקְּשִׁים ]]); [[דְּרָכָיו]] ´[[נ]] Pr 14:2; as subst. of pers. Pr 3:32; of course of action Is 30:12 (‖[[עשֶׁק ]]), i.e. crookedness = craftiness, cunning, cf. De Che Di.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[אַל־יַלִּיזוּ מֵעֵינֶיְ]] Pr 4:21 (subj. [[דְּבָרַי]] let them [my words] not depart (on form v. Ges:§ 72 R. 9) from thine eyes (strictly, let them not practise, exhibit, deviation, direct causat., Kö.i. 205).
